languages.text: "Если коротко: нам нужно спуститься в канализационные тоннели Футфола, установить в старый воздуховод баллон с усыпляющим газом и направить поток в убежище Фалько.. и, конечно же, молиться Великому, чтобы нас не заметили шакалы этого ашмага!"

traits.locale_text: "Если коротко: нам нужно спуститься в канализационные тоннели Футфола, установить в старый воздуховод баллон с усыпляющим газом и направить поток в убежище Фалько..." {n}Металлические пальцы, загибаясь, тихонько поскрипывают.{/n} "И, конечно же, молиться Великому, чтобы нас не заметили шакалы Фалько!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"
languages.original_text: "Если коротко: нам нужно спуститься в канализационные тоннели Футфола, установить в старый воздуховод баллон с усыпляющим газом и направить поток в убежище Фалько.. и, конечно же, молиться Великому, чтобы нас не заметили шакалы этого ашмага!"

traits.locale_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「要は、フットフォールの下水トンネルに降りて、睡眠ガスのタンクを古い換気システムに接続し、空気の流れをファルコの隠れ家に導く必要があるの…そしてもちろん、エグザルテッド・ワンにアッシュマグのジャッカルがあたしたちを見つけませんように、と祈らなくてはね！」
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: 「要は、フットフォールの下水トンネルに降りて、睡眠ガスのタンクを古い換気システムに接続し、空気の流れをファルコの隠れ家に導く必要があるの…そしてもちろん、エグザルテッド・ワンにアッシュマグのジャッカルがあたしたちを見つけませんように、と祈らなくてはね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “大体上是这样的：我们得钻进落脚港的下水道，把催眠气瓶连接到以前的通风系统上，将催眠气体送到法尔科的藏身之处……当然，我们还得向至高无上的神皇祈祷，希望那个坏种手下的豺狼不要发现我们！”
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: “大体上是这样的：我们得钻进落脚港的下水道，把催眠气瓶连接到以前的通风系统上，将催眠气体送到法尔科的藏身之处……当然，我们还得向至高无上的神皇祈祷，希望那个坏家伙手下的豺狼不要发现我们！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Lo primordial es que hay que bajar a los túneles de las alcantarillas de Paso, conectar un tanque de gas somnífero al antiguo sistema de ventilación y dirigir la corriente al escondite de Falco... Ah, ¡y, por supuesto, rezarle al Exaltado por que los esbirros de ese ashmag no nos pillen!».
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo primordial es que hay que bajar a los túneles de las alcantarillas de Paso, conectar un tanque de gas somnífero al antiguo sistema de ventilación y dirigir la corriente al escondite de Falco... Ah, ¡y, por supuesto, rezarle al Exaltado por que los esbirros de ese ashmag no nos pillen!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pour faire court, on va s'enfoncer dans les égouts de Castel, raccorder une bonbonne de gaz soporifique au vieux système de ventilation et diriger son flux vers la cachette de Falco... Tout en priant l'Exalté que ses larbins ne nous repèrent pas ! »
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: « Pour faire court, on va s'enfoncer dans les égouts de Castel, raccorder une bonbonne de gaz soporifique au vieux système de ventilation et diriger son flux vers la cachette de Falco... Tout en priant l'Exalté que ses larbins ne nous repèrent pas ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Im Prinzip geht es darum, dass wir in die Kanalisationstunnel von Footfall hinuntersteigen, einen Tank Schlafgas an das alte Ventilationssystem anschließen, die Luft in Falcos Versteck leiten ... und natürlich zum Erhabenen beten, dass die Schakale des Ashmag uns nicht entdecken!"
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Prinzip geht es darum, dass wir in die Kanalisationstunnel von Footfall hinuntersteigen, einen Tank Schlafgas an das alte Ventilationssystem anschließen, die Luft in Falcos Versteck leiten ... und natürlich zum Erhabenen beten, dass die Schakale des Ashmag uns nicht entdecken!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şöyle ki Binliman'ın kanalizasyon tünellerine ineceğiz. Eski havalandırma sistemine uyku gazı tüpü bağlayacak ve hava akışını Falco'nun sığınağına vereceğiz. Bir de külboğazın çakalları bizi görmesin diye Görkemli'ye dua edeceğiz elbette!"
languages.original_text: "The gist is that we need to go down into the sewer tunnels of Footfall, connect a tank of sleeping gas to the old ventilation system, and direct the airflow to Falco's hideout... and, of course, pray to the Exalted One that the ashmag's jackals don't spot us!"

traits.locale_text: "Şöyle; Binliman'ın kanalizasyon tünellerine ineceğiz. Eski havalandırma sistemine uyku gazı tüpü bağlayacak ve hava akışını Falco'nun sığınağına vereceğiz. Bir de külboğazın çakalları bizi görmesin diye Görkemli'ye dua edeceğiz elbette!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
